mapper.select:
/* 렌탈CB 연체정보 조회 (고객번호별) */ WITH RENTAL_CB AS ( SELECT Y1.LCDAMT - Y1.BTD_DLQ_ADD_AMT + Y1.THM_DLQ_ADD_DP_SUM_AMT AS DLQ_AMT , Y1.LCDAMT - Y1.BTD_DLQ_ADD_AMT - Y1.NET_DP_AMT AS DLQ_BLAM , Y1.* FROM ( SELECT C2.CNTR_NO , C2.CNTR_SN , C1.CNTR_CST_NO , C1.CNTR_CST_NM , C1.COPN_DV_CD , C1.CNTR_CNFM_DTM , C2.SELL_TP_CD , C2.SELL_TP_DTL_CD , C2.CNTR_DTL_STAT_CD , C2.CNTR_PD_STRTDT , C2.CNTR_PD_ENDDT , NVL(Q1.EOT_DLQ_AMT, 0) AS EOT_DLQ_AMT , NVL(Q1.EOT_DLQ_AMT, 0) + (NVL(Q1.BTD_DLQ_ADD_AMT, 0) - LEAST(NVL(Q1.THM_CTR_DLQ_ADD_AMT, 0) + NVL(Q1.THM_DLQ_ADD_DP_SUM_AMT, 0) - NVL(Q1.THM_DLQ_ADD_RFND_SUM_AMT, 0), NVL(Q1.BTD_DLQ_ADD_AMT, 0))) + NVL(Q2.EOT_BOR_AMT, 0)AS LCDAMT -- 연체금액(LCDAMT) , NVL(Q1.BTD_DLQ_ADD_AMT, 0) AS BTD_DLQ_ADD_AMT-- 기초금액(LCAM81) , S1.MLG_DP_AMT , S1.MLG_RFND_AMT , S1.THM_ATAM_DP_AMT , S1.THM_ATAM_RFND_AMT , NVL(Q1.THM_DLQ_ADD_DP_SUM_AMT, 0) AS THM_DLQ_ADD_DP_SUM_AMT -- 당월연체가산입금합계금액 , S1.MLG_DP_AMT - S1.MLG_RFND_AMT + S1.THM_ATAM_DP_AMT - S1.THM_ATAM_RFND_AMT AS NET_DP_AMT , S1.SL_RCOG_DT , C2.BASE_PD_CD , C4.DP_TP_CD , C4.MPY_BSDT , (CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(Q1.PERF_YM, 'YYYYMM'), 1), 'YYYYMM') = #{baseYm} THEN #{baseYm} || '01' ELSE Q1.PERF_YM || C4.MPY_BSDT END ) AS OC_BSDT /*발생일자-MPY_BSDT 납부기준일자*/ , ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY C2.CNTR_NO, C2.CNTR_SN ORDER BY C4.FNL_MDFC_DTM DESC) AS RN FROM TB_SSCT_CNTR_BAS C1 INNER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_DTL C2 ON C1.CNTR_NO = C2.CNTR_NO LEFT JOIN TB_CBCL_DLQ_BAS Q1 ON C2.CNTR_NO = Q1.CNTR_NO AND C2.CNTR_SN = Q1.CNTR_SN AND Q1.PERF_YM = TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(#{baseYm},'YYYYMM'),-1),'YYYYMM') /*전월기준*/ AND Q1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' LEFT JOIN TB_CBCL_WELLS_BOR_AMT_BAS Q2 ON Q1.CNTR_NO = Q2.CNTR_NO AND Q1.CNTR_SN = Q2.CNTR_SN AND Q1.PERF_YM = Q2.PERF_YM AND Q2.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' INNER JOIN TB_CBCL_WELLS_SL_MM_CL_IZ S1 ON C2.CNTR_NO = S1.CNTR_NO AND C2.CNTR_SN = S1.CNTR_SN AND S1.SL_CL_YM = #{baseYm} /*당월기준*/ INNER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_STLM_REL C3 ON C2.CNTR_NO = C3.DTL_CNTR_NO AND C2.CNTR_SN = C3.DTL_CNTR_SN AND #{baseYm} BETWEEN SUBSTR(C3.VL_STRT_DTM, 1, 6) AND SUBSTR(C3.VL_END_DTM, 1, 6) INNER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_STLM_BAS C4 ON C3.CNTR_STLM_ID = C4.CNTR_STLM_ID WHERE 1 = 1 AND C1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND C2.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND C2.SELL_TP_CD = '2' AND C2.SELL_TP_DTL_CD IN ('22', '24', '25') /*판매유형상세코드-리스*/ AND C1.CNTR_CNFM_DTM >= '20200901' AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT '1' FROM TB_CBBO_WELLS_RENTAL_CB_DLQ_IZ X1 WHERE C1.CNTR_CST_NO = X1.CST_NO AND X1.RENTAL_CB_RGST_DV_CD IN ('1','3') AND X1.NOTY_RCV_YN = 'Y' AND X1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N') ) Y1 WHERE 1 = 1 AND Y1.RN = 1 ) SELECT DISTINCT B1.CST_NO , T1.CNTR_CST_NM AS CST_KNM , T1.COPN_DV_CD , F_CMZ_CD_NM('TNT_WELLS', 'COPN_DV_CD', T1.COPN_DV_CD) AS COPN_DV_NM /*법인격구분명*/ , T1.SELL_TP_CD , F_CMZ_CD_NM('TNT_WELLS', 'SELL_TP_CD', T1.SELL_TP_CD) AS SELL_TP_NM , B1.CRAL_LOCARA_TNO , B1.MEXNO_ENCR , B1.CRAL_IDV_TNO , SUM(T1.DLQ_AMT) OVER(PARTITION BY B1.CST_NO) AS DLQ_AMT , SUM(GREATEST(T1.DLQ_BLAM, 0)) OVER(PARTITION BY B1.CST_NO) AS DLQ_BLAM , N1.CLCTAM_PRTNR_NO , N2.PRTNR_KNM , '1588-4113' AS DSPH_TNO /*발신번호*/ FROM RENTAL_CB T1 INNER JOIN TB_CUBS_CST_BAS B1 ON T1.CNTR_CST_NO = B1.CST_NO INNER JOIN TB_PDBS_PD_BAS P1 ON T1.BASE_PD_CD = P1.PD_CD INNER JOIN TB_PDBS_PD_CLSF_BAS P2 ON P1.PD_CLSF_ID = P2.PD_CLSF_ID INNER JOIN LATERAL ( SELECT X1.* FROM TB_CBBO_BND_CNTR_BAS X1 WHERE T1.CNTR_NO = X1.CNTR_NO AND T1.CNTR_SN = X1.CNTR_SN AND X1.BASE_YM >= SUBSTR(T1.OC_BSDT, 1, 6) AND X1.BND_CLCTN_PRP_RSON_CD IN ('20', '3C', '80') ORDER BY X1.BASE_YM ASC FETCH FIRST 1 ROW ONLY ) N1 ON 1 = 1 LEFT JOIN TB_CBBO_CLCTAM_PRTNR_DTL N2 ON N1.CLCTAM_PRTNR_NO = N2.PRTNR_NO WHERE 1 = 1
AND B1.CST_NO = #{cstNo} /*고객번호*/
AND B1.CRAL_LOCARA_TNO = #{cralLocaraTno} /*휴대폰번호1*/
AND B1.MEXNO_ENCR = #{mexnoEncr} /*휴대폰번호2-입력된값을 암호화하여 대입*/
AND B1.CRAL_IDV_TNO = #{cralIdvTno} /*휴대폰번호3*/
AND T1.DLQ_AMT > 0 AND T1.DLQ_BLAM >= 100000 AND T1.CNTR_CST_NO IN (SELECT X1.CNTR_CST_NO FROM RENTAL_CB X1 GROUP BY X1.CNTR_CST_NO HAVING SUM(X1.DLQ_BLAM) >= 100000) AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM TB_CBBO_BND_CNTC_EXCD_OJ_IZ X1 WHERE T1.CNTR_CST_NO = X1.CST_NO AND X1.CTNT_EXCD_BND_BIZ_CD = '02' -- 렌탈CB AND X1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND #{baseYm} BETWEEN SUBSTR(X1.APY_STRTDT, 1, 6) AND SUBSTR(X1.APY_ENDDT, 1, 6))

/* 렌탈CB 연체정보 조회 (계약별) */ WITH RENTAL_CB AS ( SELECT Y1.LCDAMT - Y1.BTD_DLQ_ADD_AMT + Y1.THM_DLQ_ADD_DP_SUM_AMT AS DLQ_AMT , Y1.LCDAMT - Y1.BTD_DLQ_ADD_AMT - Y1.NET_DP_AMT AS DLQ_BLAM , Y1.* FROM ( SELECT C2.CNTR_NO , C2.CNTR_SN , C1.CNTR_CST_NO , C1.CNTR_CST_NM , C1.COPN_DV_CD , C1.CNTR_CNFM_DTM , C2.SELL_TP_CD , C2.SELL_TP_DTL_CD , C2.CNTR_DTL_STAT_CD , C2.CNTR_PD_STRTDT , C2.CNTR_PD_ENDDT , NVL(Q1.EOT_DLQ_AMT, 0) AS EOT_DLQ_AMT , NVL(Q1.EOT_DLQ_AMT, 0) + (NVL(Q1.BTD_DLQ_ADD_AMT, 0) - LEAST(NVL(Q1.THM_CTR_DLQ_ADD_AMT, 0) + NVL(Q1.THM_DLQ_ADD_DP_SUM_AMT, 0) - NVL(Q1.THM_DLQ_ADD_RFND_SUM_AMT, 0), NVL(Q1.BTD_DLQ_ADD_AMT, 0))) + NVL(Q2.EOT_BOR_AMT, 0)AS LCDAMT -- 연체금액(LCDAMT) , NVL(Q1.BTD_DLQ_ADD_AMT, 0) AS BTD_DLQ_ADD_AMT-- 기초금액(LCAM81) , S1.MLG_DP_AMT , S1.MLG_RFND_AMT , S1.THM_ATAM_DP_AMT , S1.THM_ATAM_RFND_AMT , NVL(Q1.THM_DLQ_ADD_DP_SUM_AMT, 0) AS THM_DLQ_ADD_DP_SUM_AMT -- 당월연체가산입금합계금액 , S1.MLG_DP_AMT - S1.MLG_RFND_AMT + S1.THM_ATAM_DP_AMT - S1.THM_ATAM_RFND_AMT AS NET_DP_AMT , S1.SL_RCOG_DT , C2.BASE_PD_CD , C4.DP_TP_CD , C4.MPY_BSDT , (CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(Q1.PERF_YM, 'YYYYMM'), 1), 'YYYYMM') = #{baseYm} THEN #{baseYm} || '01' ELSE Q1.PERF_YM || C4.MPY_BSDT END ) AS OC_BSDT /*발생일자-MPY_BSDT 납부기준일자*/ , ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY C2.CNTR_NO, C2.CNTR_SN ORDER BY C4.FNL_MDFC_DTM DESC) AS RN FROM TB_SSCT_CNTR_BAS C1 INNER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_DTL C2 ON C1.CNTR_NO = C2.CNTR_NO LEFT JOIN TB_CBCL_DLQ_BAS Q1 ON C2.CNTR_NO = Q1.CNTR_NO AND C2.CNTR_SN = Q1.CNTR_SN AND Q1.PERF_YM = TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(#{baseYm},'YYYYMM'),-1),'YYYYMM') /*전월기준*/ AND Q1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' LEFT JOIN TB_CBCL_WELLS_BOR_AMT_BAS Q2 ON Q1.CNTR_NO = Q2.CNTR_NO AND Q1.CNTR_SN = Q2.CNTR_SN AND Q1.PERF_YM = Q2.PERF_YM AND Q2.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' INNER JOIN TB_CBCL_WELLS_SL_MM_CL_IZ S1 ON C2.CNTR_NO = S1.CNTR_NO AND C2.CNTR_SN = S1.CNTR_SN AND S1.SL_CL_YM = #{baseYm} /*당월기준*/ INNER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_STLM_REL C3 ON C2.CNTR_NO = C3.DTL_CNTR_NO AND C2.CNTR_SN = C3.DTL_CNTR_SN AND #{baseYm} BETWEEN SUBSTR(C3.VL_STRT_DTM, 1, 6) AND SUBSTR(C3.VL_END_DTM, 1, 6) INNER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_STLM_BAS C4 ON C3.CNTR_STLM_ID = C4.CNTR_STLM_ID WHERE 1 = 1 AND C1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND C2.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND C2.SELL_TP_CD = '2' AND C2.SELL_TP_DTL_CD IN ('22', '24', '25') /*판매유형상세코드-리스*/ AND C1.CNTR_CNFM_DTM >= '20200901' AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT '1' FROM TB_CBBO_WELLS_RENTAL_CB_DLQ_IZ X1 WHERE C1.CNTR_CST_NO = X1.CST_NO AND X1.RENTAL_CB_RGST_DV_CD IN ('1','3') AND X1.NOTY_RCV_YN = 'Y' AND X1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N') ) Y1 WHERE 1 = 1 AND Y1.RN = 1 ) SELECT B1.CST_NO , T1.CNTR_NO , T1.CNTR_SN , T1.CNTR_NO || '-' || T1.CNTR_SN AS CNTR_DTL_NO , T1.CNTR_CST_NM AS CST_KNM , T1.COPN_DV_CD , F_CMZ_CD_NM('TNT_WELLS', 'COPN_DV_CD', T1.COPN_DV_CD) AS COPN_DV_NM /*법인격구분명*/ , T1.SELL_TP_CD , F_CMZ_CD_NM('TNT_WELLS', 'SELL_TP_CD', T1.SELL_TP_CD) AS SELL_TP_NM , P2.PD_CLSF_NM , T1.SL_RCOG_DT , B1.CRAL_LOCARA_TNO , B1.MEXNO_ENCR , B1.CRAL_IDV_TNO , T1.DP_TP_CD , F_CMZ_CD_NM('TNT_WELLS', 'DP_TP_CD', T1.DP_TP_CD) AS FNT_DV_NM , T1.DLQ_AMT , GREATEST(T1.DLQ_BLAM, 0) AS DLQ_BLAM , N1.CLCTAM_PRTNR_NO , N2.PRTNR_KNM , '1588-4113' AS DSPH_TNO /*발신번호*/ FROM RENTAL_CB T1 INNER JOIN TB_CUBS_CST_BAS B1 ON T1.CNTR_CST_NO = B1.CST_NO INNER JOIN TB_PDBS_PD_BAS P1 ON T1.BASE_PD_CD = P1.PD_CD INNER JOIN TB_PDBS_PD_CLSF_BAS P2 ON P1.PD_CLSF_ID = P2.PD_CLSF_ID INNER JOIN LATERAL ( SELECT X1.* FROM TB_CBBO_BND_CNTR_BAS X1 WHERE T1.CNTR_NO = X1.CNTR_NO AND T1.CNTR_SN = X1.CNTR_SN AND X1.BASE_YM >= SUBSTR(T1.OC_BSDT, 1, 6) AND X1.BND_CLCTN_PRP_RSON_CD IN ('20', '3C', '80') ORDER BY X1.BASE_YM ASC FETCH FIRST 1 ROW ONLY ) N1 ON 1 = 1 LEFT JOIN TB_CBBO_CLCTAM_PRTNR_DTL N2 ON N1.CLCTAM_PRTNR_NO = N2.PRTNR_NO WHERE 1 = 1
AND B1.CST_NO = #{cstNo} /*고객번호*/
AND B1.CRAL_LOCARA_TNO = #{cralLocaraTno} /*휴대폰번호1*/
AND B1.MEXNO_ENCR = #{mexnoEncr} /*휴대폰번호2-입력된값을 암호화하여 대입*/
AND B1.CRAL_IDV_TNO = #{cralIdvTno} /*휴대폰번호3*/
AND T1.DLQ_AMT > 0 AND T1.DLQ_BLAM >= 100000 AND T1.CNTR_CST_NO IN (SELECT X1.CNTR_CST_NO FROM RENTAL_CB X1 GROUP BY X1.CNTR_CST_NO HAVING SUM(X1.DLQ_BLAM) >= 100000) AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM TB_CBBO_BND_CNTC_EXCD_OJ_IZ X1 WHERE T1.CNTR_CST_NO = X1.CST_NO AND X1.CTNT_EXCD_BND_BIZ_CD = '02' -- 렌탈CB AND X1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND #{baseYm} BETWEEN SUBSTR(X1.APY_STRTDT, 1, 6) AND SUBSTR(X1.APY_ENDDT, 1, 6))

/* 렌탈CB납입정보(팝업) */ WITH RENTAL_CB AS ( SELECT Y1.LCDAMT - Y1.BTD_DLQ_ADD_AMT + Y1.THM_DLQ_ADD_DP_SUM_AMT AS DLQ_AMT , Y1.LCDAMT - Y1.BTD_DLQ_ADD_AMT - Y1.NET_DP_AMT AS DLQ_BLAM , Y1.* FROM ( SELECT C2.CNTR_NO , C2.CNTR_SN , C1.CNTR_CST_NO , C1.CNTR_CST_NM , C1.COPN_DV_CD , C1.CNTR_CNFM_DTM , C2.SELL_TP_CD , C2.SELL_TP_DTL_CD , C2.CNTR_DTL_STAT_CD , C2.CNTR_PD_STRTDT , C2.CNTR_PD_ENDDT , NVL(Q1.EOT_DLQ_AMT, 0) AS EOT_DLQ_AMT , NVL(Q1.EOT_DLQ_AMT, 0) + (NVL(Q1.BTD_DLQ_ADD_AMT, 0) - LEAST(NVL(Q1.THM_CTR_DLQ_ADD_AMT, 0) + NVL(Q1.THM_DLQ_ADD_DP_SUM_AMT, 0) - NVL(Q1.THM_DLQ_ADD_RFND_SUM_AMT, 0), NVL(Q1.BTD_DLQ_ADD_AMT, 0))) + NVL(Q2.EOT_BOR_AMT, 0) AS LCDAMT -- 연체금액(LCDAMT) , NVL(Q1.BTD_DLQ_ADD_AMT, 0) AS BTD_DLQ_ADD_AMT-- 기초금액(LCAM81) , S1.MLG_DP_AMT , S1.MLG_RFND_AMT , S1.THM_ATAM_DP_AMT , S1.THM_ATAM_RFND_AMT , NVL(Q1.THM_DLQ_ADD_DP_SUM_AMT, 0) AS THM_DLQ_ADD_DP_SUM_AMT -- 당월연체가산입금합계금액 , S1.MLG_DP_AMT - S1.MLG_RFND_AMT + S1.THM_ATAM_DP_AMT - S1.THM_ATAM_RFND_AMT AS NET_DP_AMT , S1.SL_RCOG_DT , C2.BASE_PD_CD , C4.DP_TP_CD , C4.MPY_BSDT , (CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(Q1.PERF_YM, 'YYYYMM'), 1), 'YYYYMM') = #{baseYm} THEN #{baseYm} || '01' ELSE Q1.PERF_YM || C4.MPY_BSDT END ) AS OC_BSDT /*발생일자-MPY_BSDT 납부기준일자*/ , ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY C2.CNTR_NO, C2.CNTR_SN ORDER BY C4.FNL_MDFC_DTM DESC) AS RN , (SELECT MAX(SUBSTR(Z3.FWBOO_DTM, 1, 8)) FROM TB_CBBO_BND_MSG_RELY_IZ Z3 /* 채권메시지중계내역 */ WHERE Z3.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND Z3.FW_BIZ_NM = 'BN_KAKAO_MESSAGE' /*발송업무명*/ AND Z3.MSG_FW_TP_CD = '01' /*메시지발송유형코드-01:카카오알림톡*/ AND Z3.BND_MSG_TP_VAL1 = 'B' /*채권알림톡업무코드-B:등록관련*/ AND Z3.BND_MSG_TP_VAL2 = 'B05' /*채권알림톡업무상세코드-B05:렌탈CB연체정보등록 예고*/ AND Z3.CST_NO = C1.CNTR_CST_NO) AS FWBOO_DT FROM TB_SSCT_CNTR_BAS C1 INNER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_DTL C2 ON C1.CNTR_NO = C2.CNTR_NO LEFT JOIN TB_CBCL_DLQ_BAS Q1 ON C2.CNTR_NO = Q1.CNTR_NO AND C2.CNTR_SN = Q1.CNTR_SN AND Q1.PERF_YM = TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(#{baseYm},'YYYYMM'),-1),'YYYYMM') /*전월기준*/ AND Q1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' LEFT JOIN TB_CBCL_WELLS_BOR_AMT_BAS Q2 ON Q1.CNTR_NO = Q2.CNTR_NO AND Q1.CNTR_SN = Q2.CNTR_SN AND Q1.PERF_YM = Q2.PERF_YM AND Q2.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' INNER JOIN TB_CBCL_WELLS_SL_MM_CL_IZ S1 ON C2.CNTR_NO = S1.CNTR_NO AND C2.CNTR_SN = S1.CNTR_SN AND S1.SL_CL_YM = #{baseYm} /*당월기준*/ INNER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_STLM_REL C3 ON C2.CNTR_NO = C3.DTL_CNTR_NO AND C2.CNTR_SN = C3.DTL_CNTR_SN AND #{baseYm} BETWEEN SUBSTR(C3.VL_STRT_DTM, 1, 6) AND SUBSTR(C3.VL_END_DTM, 1, 6) INNER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_STLM_BAS C4 ON C3.CNTR_STLM_ID = C4.CNTR_STLM_ID WHERE 1 = 1 AND C1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND C2.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND C2.SELL_TP_CD = '2' AND C2.SELL_TP_DTL_CD IN ('22', '24', '25') /*판매유형상세코드-리스*/ AND C1.CNTR_CNFM_DTM >= '20200901' AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT '1' FROM TB_CBBO_WELLS_RENTAL_CB_DLQ_IZ X1 WHERE C1.CNTR_CST_NO = X1.CST_NO AND X1.RENTAL_CB_RGST_DV_CD IN ('1','3') AND X1.NOTY_RCV_YN = 'Y' AND X1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N') ) Y1 WHERE 1 = 1 AND Y1.RN = 1 ) SELECT T1.CNTR_CST_NO AS CST_NO , T1.CNTR_CST_NM AS CST_KNM , T1.CNTR_NO || '-' || T1.CNTR_SN AS CNTR_DTL_NO , F_CMZ_CD_NM('TNT_WELLS', 'COPN_DV_CD', T1.COPN_DV_CD) AS COPN_DV_NM /*법인격구분명*/ , T1.COPN_DV_CD , F_CMZ_CD_NM('TNT_WELLS', 'SELL_TP_CD', T1.SELL_TP_CD) AS SELL_TP_NM , P2.PD_CLSF_NM , T1.SL_RCOG_DT , B1.CRAL_LOCARA_TNO , B1.MEXNO_ENCR , B1.CRAL_IDV_TNO , T1.MPY_BSDT , F_CMZ_CD_NM('TNT_WELLS', 'DP_TP_CD', T1.DP_TP_CD) AS FNT_DV_NM , T1.DLQ_AMT , GREATEST(T1.DLQ_BLAM, 0) AS DLQ_BLAM , N1.CLCTAM_PRTNR_NO , N2.PRTNR_KNM , '1588-4113' AS DSPH_TNO /*발신번호*/ , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(T1.FWBOO_DT,'YYYYMMDD')+4,'YYYYMMDD') AS RGST_SCH_DT /*등록예정일자-알림톡발송일자+4일*/ , (SELECT RENTAL_CB_RGST_DV_CD FROM TB_CBBO_WELLS_RENTAL_CB_DLQ_IZ X1 WHERE T1.CNTR_CST_NO = X1.CST_NO AND T1.CNTR_NO = X1.CNTR_NO AND X1.RENTAL_CB_RGST_DV_CD IN ('1','3') AND NVL(X1.DLQ_BLAM, 0) > 0 /* 연체잔액 */ AND X1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' ) AS RENTAL_CB_RGST_DV_CD /*NICE발송제외여부*/ , T1.FWBOO_DT /*알림톡발송일자*/ , (SELECT (CASE WHEN X9.RESULT = '1000' THEN 'Y' WHEN X9.RESULT != '1000' THEN 'N' END) FROM TB_CBBO_BND_MSG_RELY_IZ X7 /* 채권메시지중계내역 */ INNER JOIN ATA_MMT_TRAN X8 /* 전송테이블 */ ON X8.RESERVED2 = X7.BND_MSG_RELY_ID /*채권메시지중계ID*/ AND X8.RESERVED3 = X7.FW_BIZ_NM /*발송업무명*/ AND X8.RESERVED4 = X7.BND_MSG_TP_VAL1 /*채권알림톡업무코드*/ AND X8.RESERVED5 = X7.BND_MSG_TP_VAL2 /*채권알림톡업무상세코드*/ AND X8.TEMPLATE_CODE = 'wells18153' /* 템플릿코드 */ INNER JOIN ATA_MMT_LOG X9 /* 로그테이블 */ ON X9.MT_PR = X8.MT_PR WHERE X7.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND X7.FW_BIZ_NM = 'BN_KAKAO_MESSAGE' /* 발송업무명 */ AND X7.MSG_FW_TP_CD = '01' /* 메시지발송유형코드-01:카카오알림톡 */ AND X7.BND_MSG_TP_VAL1 = 'B' /* 채권알림톡업무코드-B:등록관련 */ AND X7.BND_MSG_TP_VAL2 = 'B05' /* 채권알림톡업무상세코드-B05:렌탈CB연체정보등록 예고 */ AND X7.CST_NO = T1.CNTR_CST_NO ORDER BY X9.MT_SEQ DESC FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY) AS RESULT_YN /*알림톡성공여부*/ , '' AS NOTY_FW_OJ_DT /*알림톡발송제외일자*/ FROM RENTAL_CB T1 INNER JOIN TB_CUBS_CST_BAS B1 ON T1.CNTR_CST_NO = B1.CST_NO INNER JOIN TB_PDBS_PD_BAS P1 ON T1.BASE_PD_CD = P1.PD_CD INNER JOIN TB_PDBS_PD_CLSF_BAS P2 ON P1.PD_CLSF_ID = P2.PD_CLSF_ID INNER JOIN LATERAL ( SELECT X1.* FROM TB_CBBO_BND_CNTR_BAS X1 WHERE T1.CNTR_NO = X1.CNTR_NO AND T1.CNTR_SN = X1.CNTR_SN AND X1.BASE_YM >= SUBSTR(T1.OC_BSDT, 1, 6) AND X1.BND_CLCTN_PRP_RSON_CD IN ('20', '3C', '80') ORDER BY X1.BASE_YM ASC FETCH FIRST 1 ROW ONLY ) N1 ON 1 = 1 LEFT JOIN TB_CBBO_CLCTAM_PRTNR_DTL N2 ON N1.CLCTAM_PRTNR_NO = N2.PRTNR_NO WHERE 1 = 1 AND T1.DLQ_AMT > 0 AND T1.DLQ_BLAM >= 100000 AND T1.CNTR_CST_NO IN (SELECT X1.CNTR_CST_NO FROM RENTAL_CB X1 GROUP BY X1.CNTR_CST_NO HAVING SUM(X1.DLQ_BLAM) >= 100000) AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM TB_CBBO_BND_CNTC_EXCD_OJ_IZ X1 WHERE T1.CNTR_CST_NO = X1.CST_NO AND X1.CTNT_EXCD_BND_BIZ_CD = '02' -- 렌탈CB AND X1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND #{baseYm} BETWEEN SUBSTR(X1.APY_STRTDT, 1, 6) AND SUBSTR(X1.APY_ENDDT, 1, 6)) AND (SELECT NVL(MAX(NOTY_RCV_YN),'N') FROM TB_CBBO_WELLS_RENTAL_CB_DLQ_IZ /*T:WELLS렌탈CB연체내역*/ WHERE CST_NO = T1.CNTR_CST_NO) != 'Y' AND T1.LCDAMT > 0 /*연체금액*/ AND T1.CNTR_CST_NO = #{cstNo}
